title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.10 - Authority of regional fire administrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 205.10 - Authority of regional fire administrator

State Regulations

The authority and responsibility of the regional fire
administrator are suspended until the State fire mobilization and mutual aid
plan is activated. When this plan is activated, the authority and
responsibility of the regional fire administrator are instituted. When this
plan is deactivated, the authority and responsibility of the regional fire
administrator are suspended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
205.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
